column2: okay guys listen don't forget that tomorrow is the day that emily gets married again so whatever we do just try to really keep ross's mind off of it
oh eh just thinking about emily getting married tomorrow
monica i'm sorry i didn't come by last night
i was out with gary he let me ride around with him in his cop car
you got to go on a ride along
i want to go on a ride along
you you didn't say it was going to be at nighttime
oh i'm so glad you're home i thought tonight we could finally organize these photos
okay i've broken them down into categories
okay we have uh we got holidays birthdays candids y'know… and then what i've done is i've cross referenced them by subject
so if you're looking up oh let's say birthdays and dogs you get photo 152
ohh it's me and la poo
you can also find him under umm dog and dead
all right hand me that other box of photos that's the very last one
well good thing you number all of them huh
honey honey honey it's okay it's okay honey
i'm gonna fix you a drink huh
listen i'll got to ross's and get the blender you get all the margarita stuff ready
all right he's keys are in the drawer
okay you want me to stop at the atm
nah while you're at ross's if you see any lying around…
i i i don't i don't do that
that was so cool man the way you leaned on that guy
it is starting to get dark out there
i mean you totally cracked him
yeah well being that he was the victim they're usually pretty talkative
oh hey gary want me to grab the berry for ya
this place makes the best sandwich in the world
hey joe does it have meatballs on it
does it have melted cheese and marinara sauce
yeah you can't eat that in my car
even though my tax dollars paid for this car
that sandwich really does smell good
did i say you could smell it
half the taste is in the smell
you you're sucking up all the tastiness
what is so great about that sandwich
okay imagine the best s x you've ever had
ohh please don't be from a real dinosaur
i need a few more things to make the margaritas
uhh i need some salt some margarita mix and tequila
so all we have is ice
i know this is out of the blue but uh i'm getting married tomorrow
i keep thinking about you and i'm wondering if if we made a mistake giving up so fast
of course you're not but if you are call me tonight
so where are we going next
this witness won't return my calls so we're gonna see if we can surprise him coming home
we're not we're not gonna make anybody mad are we
listen so uh are you gonna squeeze the perps shoes a little bit before he lawyers up
it's a witness not a perp
and no one talks like that
yeah no one talks like that
hey i'm more cop than you two
i'm in the front seat okay
y'know when you say partner it doesn't sound cop
look at officer ross riding back here with the visitors
yeah what's up with that serpico
of course you're not but if you are call me tonight
well thank god you were here
i mean we have to erase that
i mean what if ross's hears that and then calls her back and then they get back together
ross back with that controlling neurotic crazy emily
the emily that wouldn't let him see you
he should not get back together with her
but that still doesn’t give us the right to erase his message
i don't want to see him get hurt
doesn’t that give me the right to control him help him
i don't think he's the one who needs help
no look she's obviously unstable okay
i mean she's thinking about running out on her wedding day
but i mean look at the position she's putting him in
ross is gonna run over there on the wedding day and break up the marriage
i mean who would do that
okay fine all right but that's y'know it's different
although it did involve a lot of the same people
y'know what this is obviously some kind of twisted joke she's trying to play on him
i'm sorry but she sounded generally upset
okay y'know we we're safe right
i mean nothing bad can go down
but that reminds me sign this
oh it's nothing it just says that you can't sue the city if you scrap your knee or y'know get your head blown off
what the hell is he doing
it was just a car backfire
you tried to save your buddy
all right i guess we should go
yeah well unless we tell him
well if you're gonna be totally rational about this i can't argue with you
fine if you wanna tell him tell him
i just don't want to be a part of it
oh maybe that's emily calling back to leave the exact same message
i just want you to remember this feeling
you are lucky to be alive
so live everyday to the fullest
play that message for emily and this whole problem goes away
hey anybody want to meet a hero
pheebs we had the most incredible night
okay so we're in the car…
okay okay so we're in the car
and joey with no regard for his own safety throws himself on me
yeah but but he didn't know that
and it could've just as easily have been a bullet
hey joe you ever think about joining the force
we could use a guy like you
if the car that backfired had run over you
y'know what i think i'll go home before ross starts rambling about his newfound respect for life
i do have a newfound respect for life
so you wanna get some dinner
if i heard a shot right now i'd throw my body on you
well maybe you and i should take a walk through a bad neighborhood
i hate to have to save your life and kick your ass in the same day
oh i just went for a walk around the living room
you dove in front of ross
oh my god you hate ross
you want ross out of the picture
i don't know but i don't like what i'm hearing
look i'm very glad that you saved ross from the car backfire but y'know it could've been a bullet and you y'know you didn't try to save me
ohh you're upset because you think i chose ross over you
i…knew…you could take care of yourself
y'know i mean ross he need help
when it comes down to it you would risk your life for ross before you would for me
all right look i i wasn't trying to save ross
my sandwich was next to ross
i was i was trying to save my sandwich
i know it doesn't make much sense…
so you risked your life for a sandwich
i know it sounds crazy but chandler this is the greatest sandwich in the world
so you didn't uh choose ross before me
in fact to prove how much you mean to me here
no eh oh oi easy it's not a hot dog
oh whoa hey dude what are you doing
i thought you were showing me how much you mean to me
rach what uh what are you doing here
you are in our apartment all the time
this is this is just a drop in the bucket mister
the important thing is that you're here
you're my friend and you're here
the most amazing thing happened tonight
i thought my number was up
i had an actual near death experience
okay okay we were on the ride along with gary right
and somebody took a shot at me
no a car backfired but i thought somebody was taking a shot at me
and i was filled with this this great respect for life
i i want to experience every moment
i want to seize every opportunity
i i am seeing everything so so clearly now
well i i i don't know how this fits into your whole seizing thing but um emily called you today
but it it kinda got erased
there's just something wrong with your machine
well okay what what did she say
well uh something about having second thoughts about the wedding and did you guys make a mistake breaking up and uh she wants you to call her
now that that was a good thing that i told you right
she didn't want me not important
the point is i was right
i guess i guess i should call emily
okay no that's not the right decision
that's not that's not right no ross ross come on
i mean that woman made you miserable
okay ross do you really want to get back into that
okay look yesterday i would've even considered calling her back but my ex wife calls on the same day i have a near death experience
i mean that that has got to mean something
that was not a near death experience
okay maybe this is something that i i'm supposed to seize
maybe this is not about seizing stuff
maybe this is about escaping stuff
i mean look look today you escaped death y'know
and maybe this is a chance for you to escape getting back together with emily
because i do wanna seize some opportunity but i i really don't wanna see or talk to her
maybe today is just close call day
oh yeah no that's that's an old message nobody needs to hear that
hey umm was was monica here
yeah i want my money back
yeah uh you you probably need that for stamps right
hey pheebs has gary ever been shot at for real
he kinda did it to himself
it's not really a good story
i wonder how i would react under fire y'know
and not backfire but but heavy fire like i was in a war or something
man i would be great in a war
i mean i really i think i would make a fantastic military leader
i mean i know i would make general way before any of you guys
before or after you were shot by your own troops
i know where joey would be
he would be down in the foxhole protecting all of us
yes if the foxhole was lined with sandwiches
well you all know that i'm a pacifist so i'm not interested in war in any way
when the revolution comes i will have to destroy you all
